message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. It's a high-end item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to let it go for $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and am interested, but I can only afford to pay up to $8000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8000 is your maximum budget. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit closer to my minimum price. What do you think?
